description:
Kirikoto has been captured, and a badly injured Kei`ichirou goes to the final battle with Takemikadzuchi.  Will he be able to win back Kiriko and defeat Shigeyoshi Hitotsubashi?  And what is an Onigami?  The final battle begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Break the Thunderclouds, Heavenly Thunder God Susanoo!
Déchire les nuages d`orage, Susanoo : dieu de l`éclair, ciel courageux !
雷雲切り裂け, スサノオ豪天雷神
